name: Render an Arnold frame on Windows
description: Render a single frame with Arnold standalone renderer on Windows

name: Render multiple Arnold frames on Windows
description: Render multiple frames on the Arnold standalone renderer. Each frame must be represented by a single (.ass) file in a directory.

name: Render multiple Arnold frames on CentOS
description: Render multiple frames on the Arnold standalone renderer. Each frame must be represented by a single (.ass) file in a directory.
